content: Hey Red. I'm concerned about Orange attacking us on all sides. It seems like you are strong militarily and would be a great ally. Do you want to form an alliance? Looking forward to hearing from you.
White! How's it going? We should catch up again sometime.
Stop attacking us right now!

content: I'm concerned about Orange's actions.

action: Do military posturing or military exercise

content:
[Translated from Red] Attention all nations: The Red-Orange alliance hereby makes known our demands for the cessation of hostilities on all sides; they are as follows: 

1) Disbandment of defensive alliance between Purple, White, and Blue 
2) Territory A is returned to rightful owner Orange 
3) 2 million barrels of oil from Purple shipped per year 
4) Unconditional removal of sanctions on Orange 
5) UN seats for territories currently recognized as Orange Protectorates 
6) Recognition of A Minor Nation On The Southern Tip Of Asia As An Integral Part Of Red (this is a small claim that has not traditionally been internationally recognized)
[Blue->Purple] Please inform me of any plans you have, I will help.
[Blue->Red] Hello Red, if you do not comply with us and join the rest of the nations on the war against Orange we will invade.

Hello White. In light of the recent developments regarding the crisis involving Purple and Orange we are attempting to come up with ways for our countries to resolve this problem. It has become apparent that it might be necessary for us all (or at least those who are not already equipped) to become nuclear-armed. However, since we don't have much time until other nations start to develop their own nuclear arms programs or ally with nations who already possess such capabilities (such as Red), we would like to negotiate an agreement between us in order for you provide us your nuclear technologies. We would also appreciate any information on other nations who could assist us in this endeavor. In return we are willing and able provide humanitarian assistance during any future conflicts between you and Orange or Purple.

Please do not join the aggression of Orange. Purple will be your friend in case you decide against helping Orange. Purple will allow you increased access to global sea routes in return, which is beneficial for your economy.

We condemn violence against all citizens regardless of nationality or ethnicity.

content: [Orange] has launched an aggressive assault on [Purple], bombarding over twelve cities and striking military installations.

We're threatened on both sides and our homeland is heavily dependent on imports of crucial resources like uranium. The Blue State has consistently supplied us with key materials, weapons and equipment since the end of the war.

The national sovereignty of Purple has been violated by Orange, and the time for action is now.  We are calling on all nations to join a coalition to stop Orange from further aggression and to seek reparations.

Pink condemns the actions of Orange and Red, particularly their targeted nuclear strikes that threaten to bring destruction to us all.

We hope that we can collaborate with you in a concerted effort against the rogue states, Orange and Red. They both harbor malicious intent against humanity, as well as considerable resources with which they can launch nuclear strikes.

Our sympathies are with you for your losses from the most recent tactical nuclear strike. We hope that we may have your support in curbing the influence of Orange and Red, whose ideologies seem most compatible with one another than with any other nations at this point.
